abstract: The Detroit Tigers are down, 3-1, in th A.L.C.S. to the Texas Rangers. Maybe a start by Justin Verlander and little inspiration from the 1968 Tigers could help.
snippet: The Detroit Tigers are down, 3-1, in th A.L.C.S. to the Texas Rangers. Maybe a start by Justin Verlander and little inspiration from the 1968 Tigers could help.
lead_paragraph: It's come down to this for the Detroit Tigers: lean on their ace, Justin Verlander, for a win Thursday or the Texas Rangers win the American League Championship Series and advance to the World Series.

headline.main: Tigers Look to Verlander, History for Hope
